description: Following the rather bizarre blog post two weeks ago of laptop vendor MALIBAL suggesting not supporting Coreboot due to their frustrating experiences dealing with Coreboot consulting firms, the Coreboot project itself has now issued a response...
title: Coreboot Issues Rebuttal To Recent Laptop Vendor Controversy

description: For years there have been statements about how over half of the VMs running within the Microsoft Azure public cloud are Linux-based... In a new blog post today is the first time I am seeing Microsoft cite now "over 60%" Linux marketshare on Microsoft's cloud...
title: Linux Use On Microsoft Azure Crosses 60%, AlmaLinux Now An Endorsed Distro

description: CVE-2024-9632 was made public today as the latest security vulnerability affecting the X.Org Server. The CVE-2024-9632 security issue has been present in the codebase now for 18 years and can lead to local privilege escalation...
title: Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability Affecting X.Org Server For 18 Years

description: Earlier this year Micron announced the Crucial Pro DDR5-6000 memory for AMD and Intel desktops and catering to gamers. With the newest AMD Ryzen 9000 series (Zen 5) and Intel Core Ultra Series 2 (Arrow Lake) processors out there and enjoying even faster memory, today Micron announced the Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 memory kits for greater performance. In advance of today's launch I have been testing the Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 32GB Kit (16GBx2) UDIMM Kit (CP2K16G64C38U5B) and have some initial benchmarks to share from the new Intel Core Ultra 9 285K Arrow Lake desktop.
title: Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 32GB Kit Performance With Intel Arrow Lake

description: Fedora 41 is ready for release today as a wonderful update to this leading edge Linux distribution...
title: Fedora 41 Releases Today With Many Shiny New Features

description: It looks like the upcoming Linux 6.13 cycle will be adding RISC-V support for user-space pointer masking and tagged address ABI...
title: RISC-V User-Space Pointer Masking Appears Ready For Linux 6.13

description: A set of patches are currently under review on the Linux kernel mailing list for helping to further lower idle power use for Xeon 6 Sierra Forest processors...
title: Linux Patches Aim To Further Lower Intel Sierra Forest Idle Power Use

description: Thanks to Valve's Linux graphics team, VK_EXT_device_generated_commands is now supported by the Radeon "RADV" Vulkan driver with the upcoming Mesa 24.3 release...
title: RADV Vulkan Driver Merges Device Generated Commands Support

description: Google's open-source and cross-platform Flutter UI toolkit has been forked by community developers as Flock...
title: Google's Flutter UI Toolkit Forked As Flock

description: David Rosca working for AMD has continued to improve their open-source video acceleration support within Mesa. Merged today for Mesa 24.3 is the code within the Gallium3D video acceleration front-end and the RadeonSI Gallium3D driver for handling AV1 still picture encode...
title: AV1 Still Picture Encoding Merged For Mesa 24.3 Radeon Driver
